timeline.message:
feat: disable transient dependencies

- missing direct dependencies on modules formerly added transiently by other dependencies will now result in compile errors

timeline.bodyText:
Is the terasologyModule configuration doing anything at this point?
I don't see any other references to it. What would happen if we drop it entirely and put the module dependencies straight on implementation instead of adding them one place and then extending from it?

  
    
      Terasology/templates/build.gradle
